descriptionHtml:
Adds Craftable Soul Gems To The Game, Soul Gem Fragments Are Used To Create Them In The Smithing Forge Under The "Misc" Category. You Can Create Soul Gem Fragments Using "Soulstrem" Ingots Which Can Be Obtained From Most Bandits.

============= Installation ===============
Unpack the mods zip file into your skyrim install directory, load order does not matter.

=============Where Is My Install Directory==============
You can find your install directory by Right-Clicking on your game shorcut and going to properties.

=============Compatibility================
This mod does not use scripts and all additions are uniquly named to prevent mod conflicts so this mod has no known compatbility problems with other mods.

============New Items===================
Soulstrem Ingot (Can be looted from bandits)



===========Permissions================
If you would like to use my mod or any part of it in a diferent mod or project you may do, please just notify me that you are doing so via PM (Don't worry, i don't bite)


=========New Version Packed With============
I added a new File that uses the my mod installer from here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54926/? to install it.
author: IndecentAct

files.name: Better Craftable Soul Gems Installer Edition
